io.rouz.flo.context

Class AsyncContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.rouz.flo.context.AsyncContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskContext
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dump

    public class AsyncContext
extends Object
implements TaskContext
    A TaskContext that executes evaluation and Value computations on a given Executor.

    Override TaskContext.evaluate(Task) to implement Value memoization.

      • create

      • evaluateInternal

        public <T> TaskContext.Value<T> evaluateInternal(Task<T> task,
                                                 TaskContext context)
        Description copied from interface: TaskContext
        A variant of TaskContext.evaluate(Task) that allows the caller to specify the TaskContext that should be used within the graph during evaluation.

        This is intended to be called from TaskContext implementations that form a composition of other contexts.

        Specified by:
        evaluateInternal in interface TaskContext
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the task result
        Parameters:
        task - The task to evaluate
        context - The context to use in further evaluation
        Returns:
        A value of the task result

        Specified by:
        value in interface TaskContext
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value
        Parameters:
        t - A value value supplier
        Returns:
        A value with added semantics
